variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 4.00% on the portion of income up to $17,150. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 4.50% on the portion of income over $17,150 up to $23,600. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 5.25% on the portion of income over $23,600 up to $27,900. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 5.50% on the portion of income over $27,900 up to $161,550. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 6.00% on the portion of income over $161,550 up to $323,200. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 6.85% on the portion of income over $323,200 up to $2,155,350. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 9.65% on the portion of income over $2,155,350 up to $5,000,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_8
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 8: 10.30% on the portion of income over $5,000,000 up to $25,000,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_9
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 9: 10.90% on the portion of income over $25,000,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_9 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all nine brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
